member.name: WinRT.GetActivationFactory
member.summary: Gets the activation factory for the specified runtime class.
member.param: The ID of the activatable class.
The activation factory.
TBD

The activation factory.

member.name: WinRT.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes a thread to use Windows Runtime APIs.
member.param: Specifies the apartment type of the thread to be initialized.

item.description: S_OK - Successfully initialized for the first time on the current thread
S_FALSE - Successful nested initialization (current thread was already initialized for the specified apartment type)
CO_E_INIT_TLS - Failed to allocate COM's internal TLS structure
E_OUTOFMEMORY - Failed to allocate per-thread/per-apartment structures other than the TLS
RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE - The current thread is already initialized for a different apartment type from what is specified.

member.name: WinRT.RoActivateInstance
member.summary: Activates the specified Windows Runtime class.
member.param: The class identifier that is associated with the activatable runtime class.
A pointer to the activated instance of the runtime class.

returns.para: This function can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The class was activated successfully.
instance is NULL.
The thread has not been initialized in the Windows Runtime by calling the function.
The for the class requires a full-trust process.
The interface is not implemented by the specified class.
Failed to create an instance of the class.

member.name: WinRT.WinRTActivateInstance
member.summary: Activates the specified Windows Runtime class.
member.param: The class identifier that is associated with the activatable runtime class.
A pointer to the activated instance of the runtime class.

returns.para: This function can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The class was activated successfully.
instance is NULL.
The thread has not been initialized in the Windows Runtime by calling the function.
The for the class requires a full-trust process.
The interface is not implemented by the specified class.
Failed to create an instance of the class.

member.name: WinRT.RoGetActivationFactory
member.summary: Gets the activation factory for the specified runtime class.
member.param: The ID of the activatable class.
The reference ID of the interface.
The activation factory.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: WinRT.WinRTGetActivationFactory
member.summary: Gets the activation factory for the specified runtime class.
member.param: The ID of the activatable class.
The reference ID of the interface.
The activation factory.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: WinRT.RoGetApartmentIdentifier
member.summary: Gets a unique identifier for the current apartment.
member.param: A process-unique identifier for the current apartment.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: WinRT.RoInitialize
member.summary: Initializes the Windows Runtime on the current thread with the specified concurrency model.
member.param: The concurrency model for the thread. The default is RO_INIT_MULTITHREADED.

returns.para: This function can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, and E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The Windows Runtime was initialized successfully on this thread.
The Windows Runtime is already initialized on this thread.

A previous call to specified the concurrency model for this thread as multithread apartment (MTA). This could also indicate that a change from neutral-threaded apartment to single-threaded apartment has occurred.

member.name: WinRT.WinRTInitialize
member.summary: Initializes the Windows Runtime on the current thread with the specified concurrency model.
member.param: The concurrency model for the thread. The default is RO_INIT_MULTITHREADED.

returns.para: This function can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, and E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The Windows Runtime was initialized successfully on this thread.
The Windows Runtime is already initialized on this thread.

A previous call to specified the concurrency model for this thread as multithread apartment (MTA). This could also indicate that a change from neutral-threaded apartment to single-threaded apartment has occurred.

member.name: WinRT.RoRegisterActivationFactories
member.summary: Registers an array out-of-process activation factories for a Windows Runtime exe server.
member.param: An array of class identifiers that are associated with activatable runtime classes.
An array of callback functions that you can use to retrieve the activation factories that correspond with activatableClassIds.
The number of items in the activatableClassIds and activationFactoryCallbacks arrays.
A cookie that identifies the registered factories.

returns.para: This function can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The activation factory was registered successfully.
cookie is NULL.
The thread is in a neutral apartment.
The thread has not been initialized in the Windows Runtime by calling the function.
The factory has been initialized already.
The class is not registered as OutOfProc.

member.name: WinRT.WinRTRegisterActivationFactories
member.summary: Registers an array out-of-process activation factories for a Windows Runtime exe server.
member.param: An array of class identifiers that are associated with activatable runtime classes.
An array of callback functions that you can use to retrieve the activation factories that correspond with activatableClassIds.
The number of items in the activatableClassIds and activationFactoryCallbacks arrays.
A cookie that identifies the registered factories.

returns.para: This function can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Return code
Description
The activation factory was registered successfully.
cookie is NULL.
The thread is in a neutral apartment.
The thread has not been initialized in the Windows Runtime by calling the function.
The factory has been initialized already.
The class is not registered as OutOfProc.

member.name: WinRT.RoRegisterForApartmentShutdown
member.summary: Registers an callback to be invoked when the current apartment shuts down.
member.param: The application-supplied interface.
The identifier for the current apartment.
A cookie that you can use to unregister the callback.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: WinRT.RoRevokeActivationFactories
member.summary: Removes an array of registered activation factories from the Windows Runtime.

member.name: WinRT.WinRTRevokeActivationFactories
member.summary: Removes an array of registered activation factories from the Windows Runtime.

member.name: WinRT.RoUninitialize
member.summary: Closes the Windows Runtime on the current thread.

member.name: WinRT.WinRTUninitialize
member.summary: Closes the Windows Runtime on the current thread.

member.name: WinRT.RoUnregisterForApartmentShutdown
member.param: A registration cookie obtained from a previous call to the function.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
